I'm absolutely thrilled to announce the upcoming launch of the one8 Commune in Gurgaon, and we invite you to be part of this wonderful journey! 

one8 Commune is a reflection of the spirit of Communing. Our inspiration lies in the profound idea of bringing people together, fostering connections, and creating a sense of belonging, now in the heart of G-town.

Opening doors on Sept 23, we can't wait to welcome Gurgaon to the one8 Commune community!
